text: 13:8 2 Eghaghaniba 15:6; Aisaia 19:2; Matyu 24:8Kantrin mamɨn itir darazi dɨkavigh kantrin igharazimɨn itir darazi ko mɨsogham. Eghtɨ atrivir mamɨn adarazi dɨkavigh atrivir igharazimɨn adarazi ko mɨsogham. Danganir mabar dagheba bar puvaratɨghtɨma, gumazamiziba mɨtiriamra ikiam. Eghtɨ mɨkɨmkɨziba uaghan otivam. Osɨmtɨzir kaba faragh otivigham, eghtɨ nguazir kam gɨvamin dughiam tɨgharɨ. Osɨmtɨzir kaba mati, amizim otasa faraghavɨra mɨzazim barazi mokɨn.
